info.title: Laraval Challenge
info.description: Swagger documentation for the Laraval Challenge API

get.summary: Get all bank accounts for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns all bank accounts owned by the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new bank account for the authenticated user.

message.example: New Account successfully created for John Doe
New Account could not be created for John Doe

items.example: The account name field is required.

get.summary: Get a specific bank account by ID
get.description: Returns a bank account owned by the authenticated user, based on the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the bank account to retrieve

404.description: Bank account not found or access denied

get.summary: Get all debit cards for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns all debit cards owned by the authenticated user, including card type details.

post.description: Creates a new debit card for the authenticated user. The card number, CVV, and expiry date are generated automatically.

message.example: My New bank Card successfully created
My New bank Card could not be created

get.summary: Get a specific bank card by ID
get.description: Returns a single bank card (with card type) belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the bank card

put.description: Updates the bank card name for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a debit card owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the bank card to delete

message.example: Card 'Test Debit Card' deleted successfully by John Doe.

404.description: Card not found or access denied

message.example: Card not found or access denied.

post.summary: Login user and generate access token
post.description: Logs in a user and returns a Sanctum access token along with user details.
Registers a new user and returns the created user data.

items.example: The email has already been taken.
